snippet.title: Mr Wimpy: The Hamburger Game Longplay (C64) [QHD]
snippet.description:
Developed and published by Ocean in 1984

One of Ocean's earlier games, Mr Wimpy is a passable, if excruciatingly difficult conversion of the Burger Time arcade game for the Commodore 64. For those unfamiliar, Wimpy is - soon to be "was", give the economic climate - a  UK fast restaurant, so the game is actually an officially licensed product.

As I suspected, the game has no ending, but loops back to the first Burger Time level after level 8; hardly one of Ocean's greatest gaming moments, but still an interesting addition to their catalogue.

Credits
Coding: David Selwood
Graphics: David Selwood
Music: David Selwood

Time Codes
00:00 Main menu
00:17 Level 1
00:59 Level 2
02:24 Level 3
03:50 Level 4
06:11 Level 5
08:41 Level 6
13:05 Level 7
16:11 Level 8
18:29 Game over
